+ This template.
Welcome to my new, simple and clean company template that was designed for those who don't need a site with all kinds of bells and whistless, but want to display minimal information.

Features:
  • Full XML
  • Deep link support
  • Browser integration
  • HTML CSS formatted content
  • External SWF support
  • Liquid layout
  • Logo positioning and filters
  • Background options (tiled, centered or sized to browser)
  • MP3 player with volume cookie, PHP or XML driven
  • Full screen option
  • Internal lightBox
  • Fully coded for a small file size (21kb)
  • XML parser for SEO purposes (PHP)

Everything you see is either external or drawn at runtime so you don't need to have any knowledge of Flash to work this template.

+ Options options options.
Although this template is small and simple, you'll still get the options you need to create a site that matches the look and feel of your company.

Background options
  • Use a tile
  • Resize your image to browser size
  • Keep your image centered at all time

The internal shade and highlight will automatically be applied by the script!

Logo options
  • Position it left, right or centered
  • Drop a shade
  • Apply a bevel
  • Apply a glow
  • Create a reflection underneath

Color setup
  • Declare the color of the boxes
  • Declare the transparency of the boxes
  • Set the line color
  • Declare the lines' transparency
  • Set a contrast color

MP3 Player
  • Enable or disable it
  • Use PHP or XML to get the tracks
  • Play or halt on load
  • Start a random track on load

Read more about the MP3 player.

+ Have fun!
Since all of the content is HTML you can have yourself a ball with links, images, inserting other SWFs etcetc. without having to worry about knowing Flash at all, how nice is that?

In essence, your kids can build your company website, if they can read and write off course!

+ Link away!
By using the excellent combination of swfObject and swfAddress you can actually send your friends, co-workers, clients and everybody else links to specific sections of your website!

The XML parser provides the same content and internal structure of your flash file for SEO purposes and comes fully prepared, so you only add your meta tags and you're on your way.

+ Internal linking.
It's always easy if you can jump from page to page with a single click, so there is an option in the template that lets you trigger internal links from a simple HTML link.

Now, let's jump back 'home':

- Click

Before you click you might want to read the rest of this page since it actually works!

+ Idiot proof!
Proper browser integration is also provided by swfAddress, so even those visitors who love their browser buttons more then their own children can still work with this website without getting confused and whatnot.

It's a simple template for simple needs, but with the deep link engine in place it's a powerfull package that will impress your visitors!

+ Image is everything.
This template has my own variation on the lightBox theme inside, which can be triggered using a normal HTML link construction. This way you can call the box as a text link or image link from any place within the template.

The lightBox will load JPG, GIF, PNG and SWF, so you can also load in your favourite FLV player and have that display your company video.

Click here to open an image or click the image above.

The ligthBox will try and display your image in their correct size, but if the image is larger then the screen size, it gets scaled accordingly.

+ Play that tune!
The mp3 player can either use PHP to browse a directory for MP3 files or use an XML file in which you can specify which files to play (files included).

You can set it up to play or hold on load, you can have a random song start and if you hate music all together you can just leave off the entire mp3 player with a single variable in the XML file.

If you're still wondering where the mp3 player is, check the second button from the top right and have some fun with it!

Indeed, the eq bars are fake, but at least they have a random height and adjust in height according to the volume.

+ Smart volume control.
If a user adjusts the volume of the mp3 player, the value will be stored in his/her browser, so the mp3 player will start playing again at the set volume when they re-visit your site.

Okay, it's actually not that big a deal, but if you were wondering why the volume on this site reacts differently then most, you now know the answer to that question!
